name: Jigen
public_notice: Jigen (JIG) has migrated from their older contract on BNB Smart Chain to a new ETH contract. For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter.

description.en: Jigen is the first NFT gateway for Fashion and Luxury items in the Metaverse.
